title: 20 Minute low Priority Queue for No Reason
body:
Tl;Dr: League crashed for no reason (happens for no reason occasionally so at least once a month i get low priority). was afk ingame for 8 minutes. was active for 20 minutes. Was {{champion:19}}  and level one so when i got back i died alot. We recovered.  Enemy Team ff'ed. low priority queue for 20 minutes.
_does this even count as a low priority for no re-_

So,
I was playing league of legends as normally (on a mac[please forgive my sins]with some friends) and we were in the loading screen. I said to them (i was in a discord with them) "why is loading taking forever." 7 minutes later the game crashes. I relaunch league to a minute of loading then seeing that im lvl 1 and we are 8 minutes into the game. I then tried to farm minions but everyone kept killing me. Yi (the jungler) let me take jung until i recovered in levels. I participaited in some teamfights and didnt get that much kills since if i went in i would die from the 2 other people near the person i was attacking. Soon enough i started doing that (risky strats xd) and got some kills. 20 minutes in of getting jungle creeps and trying to get kills they ff. I come back into the win screen to see that im in low priority queue **for 20 minutes** A week earlier (or shorter or longer idk) i was in low priority queue for 10 minutes because macs are dumb and get random fps problems and crashing problems(and also a glitch where you have to double left click for no reason which is so annoying and only happens in blind pick that i have to restart league to fix it getting behind) but i got out of it. I might be able to earn money this summer by mowing lawns so i can get a windows thats somewhat better than a mac(probably gonna try to get alienwear but those cost so much and mowing lawns takes a long time)Can someone help?

replies.body:
Oh snap, that sucks that it took so long to get into the match, then you still ended up with another LPQ even though you were able to finish out the game =\ . It doesn't really sound fair, but essentially you were still AFK for those first 8 minutes. It's only the beginning of the game and a small amount of time, that 8 minutes could have meant the difference in winning or losing. Because you weren't in the match for so long, the system will still flag it as a left match.

Let's see if I can help out to make sure you don't have to deal with those obscene loading times anymore since an 8 min loading time is definitely not gonna work very well. Your network may be hitting some rough spots on its way to connecting with our servers, so let's start there. Check out the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), make sure to test them in a custom or practice game, and let me know if it helps!
its not my internet its my mac because sometimes alot of my programs crash for no reason and its unexpected
